taskbody.prereq: You can only clock off an operation in the clocked on state.

step.cmd: In the Machines drop-down list box, select a machine.
step.stepresult: The Open page appears, displaying a list of operations for the selected machine.

step.cmd: Select a clocked-on operation, and then select the OFF button to enable the clock-off process on an operation.

taskbody.result: The operation is clocked off and the status of the operation is modified to Complete. The timer stops tracking the time spent on the operation.
